plot: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.
title: Las dos caras del Dr. Jekyll

original_name: The Two Faces of Dr. Jekyll
plot_en: Dr. Henry Jekyll experiments with scientific means of revealing the hidden, dark side of man and releases a murderer from within himself.

cast.role: Dr. Henry Jekyll /              Mr. Edward Hyde
cast.name: Paul Massie
